The [[Kurama|Nine-Tails]] can fire a powerful beam of chakra, capable of piercing through rock.  

== Trivia == 
* In ''[[Naruto Shippūden: Kizuna Drive]]'', the Nine-Tails can fire the beam from the tip of each of its tails. The beams can be spread out to cover a large area or they can all be directed at a single point which would create an explosion.
